item.description:

at Evergreen at the

Time: 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.
Price: $35.00 includes coffee and light breakfast in the morning and dinner provided by Evergreen restaurant and caterers. (Lunch can be purchased

item.how_to_find_us: I will be there to meet you at the door!
